name: Errol

auras.raw_description: reases Ally ATK in Dungeons by 35%.

skills.name: Blazing Sword
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an extra 30% chance of inflicting a critical hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.name: Helmbreaker
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 50% chance to ignore DEF.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +15%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Negation
skills.raw_description:
Steals all buffs from a target enemy, then attacks the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +15%
Lvl. 3 Damage +15%
Lvl. 4 Damage +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
